item.title: New Feature Spotlight: Replays
item.description: Starting in Warzone 2100 version 4.2.0, replays are now available for skirmish and multiplayer games. Every skirmish or multiplayer game is recorded to a (tiny) .wzrp file, which can be played back inside WZ. For Skirmish replays: Go to “Single Player” > “View Skirmish Replay” For Multiplayer replays: Go to “Multi Player” > “View Replay” The files are stored in: <configdir>/replay/skirmish <configdir>/replay/multiplay Note: Only the most recent few dozen replays are kept around automatically.
